liǎn
trailing plant; liana; creeper; wild vine (Gynostemma pentaphyllum or Vitis pentaphylla)
висячий завод; лиана; лианы; дикая виноградная лоза (Gynostemma pentaphyllum или Vitis pentaphylla)

(Simplified: 蔹)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 斂 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 斂 [ liǎn ] to collect, to extort
①多年生蔓生草本植物，葉子多而細，五月開花，七月結球形漿果，根入藥。

蘞字的基本解释

蘞
liǎn
见“蔹”。

蘞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎn］
［《廣韻》良冉切，上琰，來。］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
亦作“蘝1”。“蔹1”的繁体字。
多年生蔓草。掌状复叶，聚伞花序，浆果球形，有白蔹、赤蔹、乌蔹莓等。

蘞字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘞； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1069第20
【唐韻】力鹽切，音廉。蔓草。【詩·唐風】葛生蒙楚，蘞蔓于野。【疏】蘞似括樓，葉盛而細。　又良冉切，音斂。【說文】同薟。白蘞，藥名。　又烏蘞莓。【本草】五葉如白蘞。　又【集韻】力驗切，音殮。義同。　又虛嚴切，音杴。詳薟字註。　或作蘞蘞字从?作。。

Awkward
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎn］
["Guang Yun" Liang Ran cut, Shang Yan, come. ]
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Also known as "蘝1". "蔹1" in traditional characters.
Perennial creeper. Palm-shaped compound leaves, cymes, spherical berries, white berries, red berries, black berries and so on.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Ji Zi Department] 　蔹; Kangxi strokes: 23; page number: page 1069 to 20
[Tang Yun] The salt is cut hard, and the sound is low. Creeper. 【Poetry·Tang Feng】Ge Sheng Meng Chu, vines in the wild. [Sparse] Suspension like a building, the leaves are full and thin.　 Liang Ran cut again, the sound was converging. 【Said the text】Same as Siegesbeck. Bai Su, the name of the medicine.　And blackberry. 【Materia Medica】The five leaves are like white berries.　[Jiyun] Forced to test and cut, the sound is dying. The same meaning.　It's empty and strict again, and the sound is faint. Detailed note of the word Siege.　Or make the word from the 蔹蔹? .
